text: <@U03FJQPSC0Y> I set up a developer account, and an app testing account to further continue testing this custom card. Unfortunately the button to join the UI extension beta is greyed out, can you assist/point me in the right direction?
The beta is only available on normal enterprise accounts and sandboxes
Thanks Carter, that doesn't make a ton of sense, wouldn't HS want developers specifically to be using this beta. I will set up a sandbox instead.

<@U03FJQPSC0Y> Is there a go live date for when this functionality will be out of beta? The project I'm currently working on is slated to go into production Q1 of next year. Should I revert back to JSON based card then, or do you think it will be available by then?
JSON based cards are deprecated, react based cards will be the only thing that will work after March 31 2024. So I would definitely use them for this project
This is now a public beta so no breaking changes will be made without at least 90 days of notice
Appreciate that info Carter, I'm still very new to the HS ecosystem, but I'm ramping up as quickly as possible!
Yes of course bro, hit me up if you ever run into any issues
